message.text: Hallway's clear. Go!
1237 - on your right
Girl's inside. Biomon's been down an hour. Better delta.
Rody, my son. Is that you?
Should have full access in 2.8 seconds
Breached it! Your turn!
Orale, lead the way, jaina.
Alarms neutralized.
J:Grr, are we fuckin' late? Is that her, that our target, V?!
V:Chrome's too simple. Not our girl, I think.
V:Keep looking.
They're coming!
V, head down!
Want more?! Hahaha! Muy bien!
V, take cover!
J:He's movin'!
B:Punch you full of holes, you dizzy cunt!
J:Cover! Find cover!
J:Blast the wall, you'll get him!
V:Can't see shit!
J:Jesus! Use your fuckin' scanner!
V:Got none to fuckin' use!
J:We out of options, here...!
T:Room he's in looks out on the balcony.
T:Got a window on the left. Go!
J:Jaina, get his attention. I'll do the rest.
J:Won't be needin' this anymore. Pussy.
T:Layout shows only one room left - the bathroom. Go!
J:Sure hope our target's in there.
V:Think I got her, got our target.
T:We make it? She alive?
J:This does not look good...
V:Know in a minute. Jacking into biomon.
V:Sandra Dorsett. NC570442. Got a winner.
V:Or she will be if we can get her to a hospital...
V:Sheesh, Trauma team Platinum, too.
J:Platinum? Shit, TT shoulda swooped in if she sneezed.
V:Something's jamming the biomon signal. Talk to me, T-Bug.
T:Virus, probably. Locate her neurosocket - should be a shard slotted in, shit's probably on that.
T:If we clear it, free up the signal, TT could actually drop in, take her off our hands.
V:Got the shard. Removing it now.
T:OK. Check her biomon again.
TTI:Greetings Sandra. An emergency evacuation unit has been dispatched and is due to arrive at your location in 180 seconds.
V:Biomon claims Trauma'll be here in three minutes.
J:Like the fuckin' cavalry. Heheh.
J:C'mon, let's get her outta here.
TTI:Your premium plan will cover 90% of the projected costs of your rescue and treatment.
J:Oh, mierda! She's flatlinin'!
T:V, need to know, what's goin' on?!
V:Jackie, airhypo!
J:Catch, jaina!
V:She's stable.
J:Fuera, jaina. Get her outside!
J:I'll cover you.
T:Swarm of the sons-of-bitches, two vans full. Just pulled up outside.
J:Fuera, get'er out. Terrace.
TT:Stand clear. Landing.
TTS1:Stop where you are!
TTS2:Place the patient on the stretcher.
TTS1:Five steps back. Now!
TTS1:I said, step back.
TTS2:TT-133 to Control. Patient NC570442 secured...
TTS2:Stimulants being administered - 70 MGs dopamine, 110 norepinephrine, 800 fibrin...
V:Hey...Give us a lift outta here? OK... no problem.
T:Cutting connection. T-Bug out.
J:All clear. Let's you and me blow.
J:Don't have much time from what Bug said.
J:I got the eddies for new wheels, now. Eyein' somethin' real fine, too.
J:How 'bout you, jaina? Prolly blow it all on booze in three days.
V:Talkin' about somebody else, Jack. I'm cleaner than a cunt at a convent.
